Copying vignette Rmd as R Markdown document template

Source: R/base.R
skeleton_update.Rd

Copying vignette Rmd as R Markdown document template

skeleton_update(rmd)

Arguments

rmd

vignette *.Rmd path. Usually: "vignettes/<filename>.Rmd"

Value

Path to the newly created/update Rmarkdown template.

Examples

sprthis(wfName = "SPRtest", analysis = "SPRtest", path = tempdir())

#> ✔ Setting active project to '/tmp/RtmpZiQ8om'
#> ✔ Creating 'R/'
#> ✔ Writing 'DESCRIPTION'
#> Package: SPRtest
#> Title: SPRtest
#> Version: 0.9.0
#> Authors@R (parsed):
#>     * First Last <first.last@example.com> [aut, cre] (YOUR-ORCID-ID)
#> Description: This package provides a pre-configured
#>     workflow and reporting template for SPRtest.
#> License: Artistic-2.0
#> URL: https://github.com/systemPipeR/SPRtest
#> Imports:
#>     systemPipeR (>= 1.25.0)
#> Suggests:
#>     BiocStyle,
#>     knitr,
#>     rmarkdown
#> VignetteBuilder:
#>     knitr
#> biocViews: Infrastructure, ...
#> Encoding: UTF-8
#> LazyData: true
#> Roxygen: list(markdown = TRUE)
#> RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
#> SystemRequirements: SPRtest can be used to run external
#>     command-line software, but the corresponding tool needs to be
#>     installed on a system.
#> ✔ Writing 'NAMESPACE'
#> ✔ Setting active project to '<no active project>'
#> [1] "/tmp/RtmpZiQ8om"
path <- file.path(tempdir(), "vignettes/SPRtest.Rmd")
skeleton_update(path)

#> [1] "/tmp/RtmpZiQ8om/inst/rmarkdown/templates/SPRtest/skeleton/skeleton.Rmd"
